      • loadAndPlay

        public static void loadAndPlay​(sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.guild.channel.message.MessageReceivedEvent event,
                               java.lang.String trackUrl,
                               boolean isqueue,
                               boolean isplaylist)
        Loads an audio and plays it afterwards.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to determine the channel (information-output), guild and the author (for language).
        trackUrl - URL of the audio the author want to have played.
        isqueue - If it will be added to the queue or played right now.
        isplaylist - If it will be added to the playlist.

      • play

        public static void play​(GuildAudioManager audioManager,
                        com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack track,
                        sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser user)
        Play the AudioTrack
        Parameters:
        audioManager - The GuildAudioManager of the guild.
        track - AudioTrack the user want to have played.
        user - User who added the track (used later for language).

      • queue

        public static void queue​(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild guild,
                         GuildAudioManager audioManager,
                         com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack track,
                         sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser user,
                         boolean refreshAudioInfo)
        Puts the AudioTrack into the queue.
        Parameters:
        guild - The IGuild which added the AudioTrack.
        audioManager - The GuildAudioManager of the guild.
        track - AudioTrack the user want to have played.
        user - User who added the track (used later for language).
        refreshAudioInfo - If the audio-info should get refreshed.

      • skipTrack

        public static void skipTrack​(sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.guild.channel.message.MessageReceivedEvent event)
        Skips the current track.
        Parameters:
        event - Event from command, used for channel (output), guild and author (language).
